skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of removing 1 random buff from the target. Also has a 10% chance of granting this Champion an Extra Turn.
skills.name: Briar Arrows
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns. Grants an Extra Turn if a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff is placed on all enemies by this skill.
skills.name: Squall of Shafts
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.desc: Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff and a 50% [Increase ACC] buff on this Champion for 3 turns, then grants an Extra Turn.
skills.name: Hunt The Mists
